citations.narrative:
The inspection team visited the facility and confirmed regulated activity without a license. Records from a regulated broker
document that the facility representative bought a Patagonian Cavy, a Flying Squirrel, and 7 hedgehogs in November
2022. The representative confirmed that they resold the Patagonian Cavy, the Flying Squirrel, and three hedgehogs
without a license. All regulated animal activity must have the appropriate license or registration from USDA APHIS Animal
Care. Correct by applying for and receiving the appropriate AWA license type before continuing regulated activity.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license/registration is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
AMY NOOYEN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
The inspection team visited the facility and confirmed regulated activity without a license. Records from a regulated broker 
document that the facility representative bought a Patagonian Cavy, a Flying Squirrel, and 7 hedgehogs in November 
2022. The representative confirmed that they resold the Patagonian Cavy, the Flying Squirrel, and three hedgehogs 
without a license. All regulated animal activity must have the appropriate license or registration from USDA APHIS Animal 
Care. Correct by applying for and receiving the appropriate AWA license type before continuing regulated activity. 
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license/registration is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
AMY NOOYEN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
